trans-unit.source: Applies a well-specified data transformation to a dataset
trans-unit.target: Applies a well-specified data transformation to a dataset

trans-unit.source: You can use the <ui>Apply Transformation</ui> module to apply a predefined transformation to the input dataset.
trans-unit.target: You can use the <ui>Apply Transformation</ui> module to apply a predefined transformation to the input dataset.

trans-unit.source: Azure Machine Learning provides the tools (modules) to create many different kinds of custom transformations.
trans-unit.target: Azure Machine Learning provides the tools (modules) to create many different kinds of custom transformations.

trans-unit.source: Remove or replace missing values, using <link xlink:href="d2c5ca2f-7323-41a3-9b7e-da917c99f0c4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Clean Missing Data</link>
trans-unit.target: Remove or replace missing values, using <link xlink:href="d2c5ca2f-7323-41a3-9b7e-da917c99f0c4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Clean Missing Data</link>

trans-unit.source: Bin, scale, and normalize data, using <link xlink:href="986df333-6748-4b85-923d-871df70d6aaf" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Normalize Data</link> or <link xlink:href="61dd433a-ee80-4ac3-87f0-b54708644d93" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Quantize Data</link>
trans-unit.target: Bin, scale, and normalize data, using <link xlink:href="986df333-6748-4b85-923d-871df70d6aaf" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Normalize Data</link> or <link xlink:href="61dd433a-ee80-4ac3-87f0-b54708644d93" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Quantize Data</link>

trans-unit.source: Create a set of compact features by calculating joint probability distribution for a dataset, using the <link xlink:href="81c457af-f5c0-4b2d-922c-fdef2274413c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Learning with count</link> modules.
trans-unit.target: Create a set of compact features by calculating joint probability distribution for a dataset, using the <link xlink:href="81c457af-f5c0-4b2d-922c-fdef2274413c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Learning with count</link> modules.

trans-unit.source: After creating the transformation, you can save and re-use it to ensure that the same parameters are applied during repeated runs of an experiment, or to transform a new dataset.
trans-unit.target: After creating the transformation, you can save and re-use it to ensure that the same parameters are applied during repeated runs of an experiment, or to transform a new dataset.

trans-unit.source: The module takes a transformation and a dataset as inputs.
trans-unit.target: The module takes a transformation and a dataset as inputs.

trans-unit.source: Typically no other parameters need to be set; all customization is done when defining the transformation.
trans-unit.target: Typically no other parameters need to be set; all customization is done when defining the transformation.

trans-unit.source: (The exception is learning with counts, which lets you customize the parameters of a previously created count table.)
trans-unit.target: (The exception is learning with counts, which lets you customize the parameters of a previously created count table.)

trans-unit.source: To apply a transformation to a new dataset, be sure to save the transformation.
trans-unit.target: To apply a transformation to a new dataset, be sure to save the transformation.

trans-unit.source: Transformations can be found in the <ui>Transforms</ui> group in the left navigation pane.
trans-unit.target: Transformations can be found in the <ui>Transforms</ui> group in the left navigation pane.

trans-unit.source: If you design a transformation for an experiment but do not explicitly save it, the transformation is available in the workspace as long as your session is open.
trans-unit.target: If you design a transformation for an experiment but do not explicitly save it, the transformation is available in the workspace as long as your session is open.

trans-unit.source: If you close the session but do not save the transformation, you can re-run the experiment to generate the <link xlink:href="444302ce-a1b6-4003-9a64-8a56120be6ce" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">iTransform</link> object.
trans-unit.target: If you close the session but do not save the transformation, you can re-run the experiment to generate the <link xlink:href="444302ce-a1b6-4003-9a64-8a56120be6ce" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">iTransform</link> object.

trans-unit.source: To see how this module is used in machine learning, see these experiments in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink>:
trans-unit.target: To see how this module is used in machine learning, see these experiments in the <externalLink><linkText>Model Gallery</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/</linkUri></externalLink>:

trans-unit.source: <externalLink><linkText>This example</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/Details/35da9465c13f4050babff2f297284dc1</linkUri></externalLink> demonstrates how to use <ui>Apply Transformation</ui> with <link xlink:href="dcaab0b2-59ca-4bec-bb66-79fd23540080" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Fisher Linear Discriminant Analysis</link>, to reduce the dimensionality of a dataset.
trans-unit.target: <externalLink><linkText>This example</linkText><linkUri>http://gallery.azureml.net/Details/35da9465c13f4050babff2f297284dc1</linkUri></externalLink> demonstrates how to use <ui>Apply Transformation</ui> with <link xlink:href="dcaab0b2-59ca-4bec-bb66-79fd23540080" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Fisher Linear Discriminant Analysis</link>, to reduce the dimensionality of a dataset.

trans-unit.source: <ui>Apply Transformation</ui> can take as input the output of any module that creates an <link xlink:href="444302ce-a1b6-4003-9a64-8a56120be6ce" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">iTransform</link>.
trans-unit.target: <ui>Apply Transformation</ui> can take as input the output of any module that creates an <link xlink:href="444302ce-a1b6-4003-9a64-8a56120be6ce" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">iTransform</link>.

trans-unit.source: You can also save and re-use filters for digital signal processing.
trans-unit.target: You can also save and re-use filters for digital signal processing.

trans-unit.source: However, filters use the <link xlink:href="838a91c6-ec59-4ffd-bea2-ff46293801d5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">IFilter</link> interface, rather than <link xlink:href="444302ce-a1b6-4003-9a64-8a56120be6ce" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">ITransform</link>.
trans-unit.target: However, filters use the <link xlink:href="838a91c6-ec59-4ffd-bea2-ff46293801d5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">IFilter</link> interface, rather than <link xlink:href="444302ce-a1b6-4003-9a64-8a56120be6ce" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">ITransform</link>.

trans-unit.source: Exception occurs if one or more of inputs are null or empty.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs if one or more of inputs are null or empty.
